verses.roman:
'kaṭake' āsiyā kaila 'gopāla' daraśana
svapneśvara-vipra kaila prabhura nimantraṇa

synonyms: kaṭake—to the city of Kaṭaka; āsiyā—coming; kaila—did; gopāla daraśana—seeing Lord Gopāla; svapneśvara-vipra—the brāhmaṇa named Svapneśvara; kaila—did; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nimantraṇa—invitation.
translation: After reaching the city of Kaṭaka, He saw the temple of Gopāla, and a brāhmaṇa there named Svapneśvara invited the Lord to eat.
